channel.title: DNSCrypt usage problem
channel.description:
I am following instructions from https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Secondary_DNS_Resolver
after installing libsodium and dnscrypt, i run it and get error:
sudo dnscrypt-proxy --tcp-only -R cypherpunk [NOTICE] Starting dnscrypt-proxy 1.4.3 [INFO] Initializing libsodium for optimal performance [INFO] Generating a new key pair [INFO] Done [ERROR] Unable to bind (UDP) [Address already in use]
how to fix?

item.title: DNSCrypt usage problem
item.dc:creator: whoami
item.description:
I am following instructions from https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Secondary_DNS_Resolver

after installing libsodium and dnscrypt, i run it and get error:

sudo dnscrypt-proxy --tcp-only -R cypherpunk
[NOTICE] Starting dnscrypt-proxy 1.4.3
[INFO] Initializing libsodium for optimal performance
[INFO] Generating a new key pair
[INFO] Done
[ERROR] Unable to bind (UDP) [Address already in use]

how to fix?

Read full topic
